channel.title: Film on Luke Jaeger
channel.description: Recent content in Film on Luke Jaeger

item.title: 5 DREAMS
item.description: A rapid-fire collage of dream-inspired animation, this 16mm film highlights animation’s historical kinship with the dream world, a protean realm where anything can turn into anything. “A fireworks of visual imagination and surreal abstraction” — Victoria (BC) Independent Film & Video Festival. Mixed 2D and 3D techniques, including drawing, collage, xerography, stop-motion, and digital animation. Soundtrack by Birdsongs Of The Mesozoic.
